title: Cheesy haddock and potato bake
ingredients: ['600g small new potatoes, scrubbed', '500g skinless, smoked haddock fillets', '1 tbsp snipped fresh chives', '150ml fish stock, hot', '200g fresh shelled or frozen peas', '4 small leeks, about 200g in total, trimmed and thinly sliced', '50g extra mature Cheddar cheese, grated']
